content:
**Online Registration:**
Yes, you can register online for the lecture on February 22nd. In fact, online registration is highly recommended to ensure your spot, as seating is limited. You can register through the Art Institute's website, which will provide you with a confirmation email and a digital ticket.

**Ticketing and Registration:**
The lecture is free, but registration is required. You can register online or at the door, but online registration is encouraged to avoid waiting in line. There is no physical ticketing process, and your digital ticket or confirmation email will serve as your proof of registration.

**Attendance Limit:**
The lecture has a limited capacity of 250 attendees, and registration will be closed once this capacity is reached. If you're interested in attending, it's a good idea to register as soon as possible to secure your spot.

**Registration Deadline:**
Online registration will close at 12:00 pm on February 22nd, or when the lecture reaches capacity, whichever comes first. If you're unable to register online, you can still try to attend the lecture, but seating will be available on a first-come, first-served basis, and there are no guarantees of availability.

**Walk-Ins:**
If you're unable to register online, you can still try to attend the lecture as a walk-in. However, please be aware that seating is limited, and there may not be available seats. Walk-ins will be accommodated on a first-come, first-served basis, and you may be asked to wait in a standby line.

To register online, simply visit the Art Institute's website, navigate to the lecture event page, and follow the registration prompts. You'll receive a confirmation email with your digital ticket, and you're all set!
